content: Nov 24 Chipmaker Microsemi Corp said on Tuesday it would buy rival PMC-Sierra Inc in a $2.5 billion deal  a day after Skyworks Solutions Inc walked away from a bidding war.

content: Microsemi Corp  hiked its offer to buy PMC-Sierra Inc  to about $2.33 billion  topping a $2.27 billion bid from Skyworks Solutions Inc  and extending - but perhaps not ending - a bidding war that started almost two weeks ago.

title: Microsemi tops Skyworks' offer for PMC as bidding war intensifies
